scripts.build: npm run morphir-elm-make-clean && npm run morphir-gen-spark-with-config
scripts.morphir-gen-scala: npx morphir-elm gen -t Scala -c -o ./target/generated-sources/main/scala --target-version 2.12 && echo 'SCALA GENERATED INTO generated-sources/scala/main''
scripts.morphir-gen-spark: npx morphir-elm gen -t Spark -o ./spark/open_reg_tech_us_lcr/src && echo 'SPARK GENERATED INTO spark/open_reg_tech_us_lcr/src'
scripts.morphir-gen-spark-with-config: npx morphir-elm gen -t Spark -o ./spark/open_reg_tech_us_lcr/src --custom-config spark.config.json && echo SPARK GENERATED INTO spark/open_reg_tech_us_lcr/src
